items.sentence: Tom has an ironclad alibi for the night of Mary\'s murder.
We have almost the same climate here as they do in Boston.
We need a few volunteers to help clean up after the party.
Tom had lamb chops, potatoes and mushroom soup for dinner.
Tom had no idea where Mary had graduated from high school.
Tom had no qualms about telling everybody what he thought.
I wonder whether or not Tom knew that Mary had to do that.
Tom jumped out of bed as soon as the alarm clock went off.
Tom lives in a three-bedroom apartment in downtown Boston.
Tom looked after Mary while her parents were out shopping.
